                                                 org.bukkit.ChatColor color)
        Creates a progress bar, with a percentage display.
        Parameters:
        progress - The current value.
        goal - The maximum value.
        lines - The amount of vertical lines, the bar consists of.
        color - The color of the bar.
        Returns:
        The progress bar string.
